sentences.en: Again a diagonal farrows works exactly the same as a normal farrow.
sentences.cn: 重复一下,斜向向前拉线和通常的向前拉线效果完全相同.

sentences.en: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.cn: 然后有一个包含六个元素的元素组,在周期表的对角线的中部。

sentences.en: Diagonal lines usually convey a sense of movement or imbalance.
sentences.cn: 斜线往往传达一种运动或不平衡.

sentences.en: diagonal parking spaces
sentences.cn: 斜线停车位

sentences.en: Draw a diagonal line to divide the square into triangles.
sentences.cn: 画一条对角线,把正方形分成两个“三角形”.

sentences.en: Draw a diagonal line to divide the square into two triangles.
sentences.cn: 画一条对角线,把正方形分成两个三角形.

sentences.en: Each stitch covers a diagonal of one cell of the grid.
sentences.cn: 每条缝线覆盖格子的对角线.

sentences.en: Footsteps had scored a diagonal path through the snow.
sentences.cn: 脚印在雪地上留下了一条对角线.

sentences.en: Here s another S curve that forms a diagonal leading line.
sentences.cn: 这是另一种S曲线,它形成了一条对角指引线.

sentences.en: How to determine if a point lies on the diagonal of a square?
sentences.cn: 如何确定一个点在一个正方形的对角线？

sentences.en: In the next steps I will show you how to use this pattern to create a diagonal mosaic pattern.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的步骤中，我将向您展示如何使用这种图案创建一个对角线的马赛克图案。

sentences.en: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.cn: 下一个,在钻石的背面-正确的边移到对角线的区段。

sentences.en: Personally I like to cut it into diagonal pieces.
sentences.cn: 我个人比较喜欢将鱼切成斜纹状.

sentences.en: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.cn: 一般读者每分钟阅读240字，而作为一个对角线读者的“阅读速度”（到不如说是浏览）接近每秒15字或大约每分钟900字。

sentences.en: The book has a diagonal black stripe on the cover.
sentences.cn: 书的封面上有条连接对角的黑斜线.

sentences.en: The Junk De Luxe Faron Polo stands out with its offset diagonal cut of blue and pink horizontal stripes.
sentences.cn: 豪华的垃圾法龙罗位居前列，其抵消了蓝色和粉红色的水平条纹对角线晋级。

sentences.en: The n vertical planes are called diagonal plane.
sentences.cn: n个竖直的平面叫做等分面.

sentences.en: The square matrix is called a diagonal matrix.
sentences.cn: 该方矩阵称为对角矩阵.

sentences.en: The truss comprises four plane trusses each two panels and each panel has one diagonal brace.
sentences.cn: 桁架由四个平面桁架组成,每两个节间及每个节间均有对角撑.

sentences.en: These methods are: diagonal braces, shear walls, and joint rigidity ( frames ).
sentences.cn: 这些方法有: 对角撑, 剪力墙, 连接刚度 ( 框架 ).

sentences.en: This bag is equipped with an adjustable diagonal band.
sentences.cn: 包包配有颗调节长短的斜跨带一根.

sentences.en: Twill fabrics have either a right - hand or left - hand diagonal.
sentences.cn: 斜纹织物的斜纹线可以是右斜的,也可以是左斜的.

words.tran_cn: 斜向移动；循对角线方向移动
与…斜向地成一行；使对角线化
斜的；[数]对角线的；斜纹的

trans.tran_cn: 对角线的，斜线的，斜的，斜纹的
trans.tran_en: a diagonal line is straight and joins two opposite corners of a flat shape, usually a square
